title: Alleged Mass. YMCA voyeur facing 21 new charges
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Crime The Brockton man previously pled guilty to similar charges and remains incarcerated.
The East Bridgewater Police Department is filing 21 additional charges against a Brockton man accused of photographing women and children in the shower at the local YMCA.
Abidan Rivera, 43, pleaded guilty in May to taking photos of a woman in a YMCA shower and is incarcerated at the Plymouth County Correctional Facility.

title: Worker killed in Revere after falling from third-floor roof, DA says
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Local News A man died Tuesday after falling from a third-floor roof of a house in Revere, officials said.
A worker died Tuesday after falling from the third-floor roof of a house in Revere, officials said.
The man, whose identity has not been released, was repairing a house at 6 Payson St.

title: Webster man allegedly used alias to scam tire shop out of $15K
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Crime Jason Dwinell, 37, allegedly used the name “David Young” to set up a fake business account with a tire shop in Auburn, according to police.
A Webster man was arraigned Friday after allegedly using a fake identity to scam a tire shop out of approximately $15,000, police in Auburn said.
Jason Dwinell, 37, pleaded not guilty to two counts of receiving stolen property over $1,200, court filings show.
